医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
妮基·黑利 (Nikki Haley) 担任总统后，医疗保健方面会是什么样子？共和党总统候选人尼基·哈利 (Nikki Haley) 将在 1 月 15 日爱荷华州预选会议（本选举年的首次总统提名竞赛）之后了解她的竞选活动如何与选民产生共鸣。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/What-would-a-Nikki-Haley-presidency-look-like-for-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/What-would-a-Nikki-Haley-presidency-look-like-for-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb84efb7-6f44-44b9-886a-2cfa8b540db2 Fri, 12 Jan 2024 07:11:18 -0500 What would a Nikki Haley presidency look like for health care?

科学家开发出非侵入性方法来监测大脑中的基因表达动态研究人员引入了一种非侵入性、灵敏的方法，使用称为释放活动标记的工程报告基因来监测大脑中的基因表达，该标记可以离开大脑进入血液中以便于检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Scientists-develop-nonpressive-way-to-monitor-gene-express-dynamics-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Scientists-develop-nonpressive-way-to-monitor-gene-express-dynamics-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c6086d6-a4c2-4d75-ba3e-a7214c1c0aa6 Fri, 12 Jan 2024 05:24:00 -0500 Scientists develop noninvasive way to monitor gene expression dynamics in the brain
